member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Protocols.WsFederation.WsFederationMessage.GetToken
member.summary: Reads the 'wresult' and returns the embedded security token.
member.exception: if exception occurs while reading security token.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Protocols.WsFederation.WsFederationMessage.GetToken(System.String)
member.summary: Processes the 'Wresult' and returns the first 'RequestedSecurityToken' found. This method is called only for netstandard 1.4 targets as XmlTextReader is not available and XmlDictionaryReader.CreateTextReader normalizes the XML causing signature failures. This is only called after it is determined the Wresult is well formed xml. A successful call the GetTokenUsingXmlReader should be made first.
member.returns: the string version of the security token.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Protocols.WsFederation.WsFederationMessage.GetTokenUsingXmlReader
member.summary: Reads the 'wresult' and returns the embedded security token.
member.exception: if exception occurs while reading security token.
